verses.kjv: The elder unto the elect lady and her children, whom I love in the truth; and not I only, but also all they that have known the truth;
verses.web: The elder, to the chosen lady and her children, whom I love in truth, and not I only, but also all those who know the truth,
verses.ct: From the elder, to the chosen lady and her children — I love you in the truth, and not just me, but everyone who has come to know the truth.

verses.kjv: For the truth’s sake, which dwelleth in us, and shall be with us for ever.
verses.web: for the truth’s sake, which remains in us, and it will be with us forever:
verses.ct: We love you because of the truth that lives in us and will be with us forever.

verses.kjv: Grace be with you, mercy, and peace, from God the Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, in truth and love.
verses.web: Grace, mercy, and peace will be with us, from God the Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, in truth and love.
verses.ct: Grace, mercy, and peace from God the Father and from the Lord Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, will be with us in truth and love.

verses.kjv: I rejoiced greatly that I found of thy children walking in truth, as we have received a commandment from the Father.
verses.web: I rejoice greatly that I have found some of your children walking in truth, even as we have been commanded by the Father.
verses.ct: It brought me great joy to discover that some of your children are living according to the truth, just as the Father commanded us.

verses.kjv: And now I beseech thee, lady, not as though I wrote a new commandment unto thee, but that which we had from the beginning, that we love one another.
verses.web: Now I beg you, dear lady, not as though I wrote to you a new commandment, but that which we had from the beginning, that we love one another.
verses.ct: Now I'm asking you, dear lady — not as if this were some new commandment, but the same one we've had from the beginning — that we love one another.

verses.kjv: And this is love, that we walk after his commandments. This is the commandment, That, as ye have heard from the beginning, ye should walk in it.
verses.web: This is love, that we should walk according to his commandments. This is the commandment, even as you heard from the beginning, that you should walk in it.
verses.ct: This is what love means: that we live according to his commandments. And this is the commandment you've heard from the very beginning — that you should live by it.

verses.kjv: For many deceivers are entered into the world, who confess not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh. This is a deceiver and an antichrist.
verses.web: For many deceivers have gone out into the world, those who don’t confess that Jesus Christ came in the flesh. This is the deceiver and the Antichrist.
verses.ct: Many deceivers have gone out into the world — people who refuse to acknowledge that Jesus Christ came in the flesh. Anyone who does this is a deceiver and an antichrist.

verses.kjv: Look to yourselves, that we lose not those things which we have wrought, but that we receive a full reward.
verses.web: Watch yourselves, that we don’t lose the things which we have accomplished, but that we receive a full reward.
verses.ct: Watch yourselves carefully, so that you don't lose what we've worked so hard for. Instead, make sure you receive your full reward.

verses.kjv: Whosoever transgresseth, and abideth not in the doctrine of Christ, hath not God. He that abideth in the doctrine of Christ, he hath both the Father and the Son.
verses.web: Whoever transgresses and doesn’t remain in the teaching of Christ, doesn’t have God. He who remains in the teaching has both the Father and the Son.
verses.ct: Anyone who wanders beyond the teaching of Christ and doesn't hold to it does not have God. But whoever remains in that teaching has both the Father and the Son.

verses.kjv: If there come any unto you, and bring not this doctrine, receive him not into your house, neither bid him God speed:
verses.web: If anyone comes to you, and doesn’t bring this teaching, don’t receive him into your house, and don’t welcome him,
verses.ct: If someone comes to you and doesn't bring this teaching, don't welcome him into your home or give him any encouragement.

verses.kjv: For he that biddeth him God speed is partaker of his evil deeds.
verses.web: for he who welcomes him participates in his evil deeds.
verses.ct: Because whoever encourages such a person becomes a partner in his evil deeds.

verses.kjv: Having many things to write unto you, I would not write with paper and ink: but I trust to come unto you, and speak face to face, that our joy may be full.
verses.web: Having many things to write to you, I don’t want to do so with paper and ink, but I hope to come to you, and to speak face to face, that our joy may be made full.
verses.ct: I have so much more to say to you, but I'd rather not put it in a letter. Instead, I hope to visit you and talk face to face, so that our joy may be complete.

verses.kjv: The children of thy elect sister greet thee. Amen.
verses.web: The children of your chosen sister greet you. Amen.
verses.ct: The children of your chosen sister send their greetings. Amen.
